title: For Sale/Trade:  NHRA Signed Race Uses Parts collection autographed NASCAR INDY
postcontent:
For sale I have a very large collection of NHRA autographed race used parts. There are 127 pistons with out rods, 47 rods with out pistons, 18 rod/piston combos, a cylinder head signed by John Force, 17 blower belts, 5 head gaskets, 13 valves, 6 piston sleeves, 2 magneto caps, spark plugs, a rocker arm, clutch disc, a piece of a body that blew up, a blower front cover, 2 bust panels, a blower pulley and guard, along with some other random pieces such as a bottle of patron signed by Alexis dejoria. All parts are signed, even if you can't see the signature in the pics. The 2 pics of all the rods are different from each other. All parts are marked with a tag that tells what diver signed it. Some tell which race they came from. I have a lot of parts that have multiple signatures. Like driver and crew chief or team mates. It took me years to collect all this. I know somebody that knows somebody that worked at the races in Pomona, and Las Vegas, so that's where most of the parts came from. Some came from the US nationals in Indy when I went up there a few years in a row. The Connie kaletta piston marked 11 of 50 sold for $100 alone at the races. I have all the big names in drag racing from 2008-2013 and a lot of the old legends too. I have a few nascar pistons, a jack roush, tony Stewart, dinnis anderson of grave digger, and a few Indy drivers, Danica Patrick and a couple others.Probably about 240-250 pieces total. I'm not sure a value on the collection, I would like to sell it all together. Probably looking at around $4500 trade value. Individually I think the collection is worth close to $10,000.for everything. Tell your friends about this! I would like to take guns as trade. Mostly interested in high end military style stuff. Make me a cash offer or let me know what trades you have! Located in shepherdsville ky 40165. Every thing is packed in boxes right now because I currently don't have room to display it all. So I don't mind showing the collection, but you have to be a serious buyer. Text me REDACTED or message/email me though here. 

I have more pics

title: For Sale/Trade:  Springfield M1 Garand - CMP Rifle - Correct Grade
location: Jacksonville, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
I have decided to part with my Springfield M1 Garand. This rifle is a CMP certified M1 Garand that was made in June 1945. This rifle has the original finish and all the parts are marked for the same time period as the receiver. This rifle is what colllectors would consider a Correct Grade, meaning that all the parts of the rifle are correct down to the time period of when the receiver was made - just like it came from the factory during WWII (many WWII rifles received replacement parts after the war). Still fires perfectly. 

The stock of this rifle is an original Springfield Armory NFR - fairly rare in the collector's community - with a tiger striped pattern (also a rare find). CMP Certificate is included.

More photos can be found here:
http://s1337.photobucket.com/user/carsoca2/library/M1%20Garand?sort=3&page=1

I will also include (48) M2 .30-06 rounds with clips for the M1 Garand and bandoleer.  

The only reason I would like to get rid of it is because it would just be a wall hanger for me, being a collectible WWII gun. I would like to give someone else the opportunity to enjoy it.

title: For Sale:  Stoeger Model 3500 12ga Semi-automatic Shotgun Camo Realtree Like New
location: NE Atlanta just ITP, near Spagetti Junction, Atlanta, Georgia
postcontent:
This is a like new  Stoeger Model 3500 semi-automatic 12 gauge shotgun with a 3.5" chamber. 
Pictures are of the actual weapon, comes with all chokes, shims and manual. 
No offers, the price is firm, no shipping.
This Stoeger boasts an attractive and practical Realtree  camouflage finish. Versatility, value and solid reliability make the M3500 the perfect choice for waterfowl, wild turkey or upland game birds. The M3500 handles a full range of loads, from 2-1/4-inch up to the potent 3-1/2-inch Magnum without adjustment. For reliability and performance, no other 3-1/2-inch semi-auto in its price range compares.

At the heart of the Stoeger M3500 is the proven Inertia Driven operating system; simple and efficient with only three moving parts in the bolt for lightning-fast, reliable operation. Unlike older gas-system guns, the M3500’s Inertia Driven action is contained primarily within the receiver; giving the Stoeger M3500 a better more centered balance and swing. With no propellant gas venting into the action, the M3500 stays cleaner longer.

This Stoeger M3500's 28" barrel is fitted with a ventilated, stepped rib and fiber-optic front sight for quick target acquisition, even under low-light hunting conditions. The alloy receiver is drilled and tapped and includes a Weaver-style scope base. All M3500’s come supplied with four choke tubes (Extra-full turkey, Full, Modified, and Improved-Cylinder), shim kit for drop and cast adjustment, and a threaded steel recoil reducer that can be installed in the buttstock to help manage felt recoil from heavy Magnum loads.

*M249 SAW Style Pistol Grip with storage compartment (currently holding a fresh set of ear plugs)
*Wood "Donkey Dick" foregrip
*5 x 30 Round Steel Magazines
*1 x 10 Round Plastic Magazine
*250 rounds of mixed FMJ, HP, SP 7.62x39 ammo
*7.62 Muzzle Brake (I replaced the factory M+M 4 prong and the recoil reduction was very noticeable and the flash is awesome)
*AK Sling
*RPK Rear Sight
*Not pictured but included if I can find it is the cheek riser that makes this gun MUCH easier to cheek weld. The rubber stopper for the folding stock is also included but the pin for it is not.

$850. As of right now I would like to do local sale, cash only.

I would rather trade the gun however, and listed some things i'd be interested in below.

postcontent:
2 - 4lb containers in stock ($130 each)

 Production of IMR powders dates back over 200 years when the company was originally founded by E.I DuPont. Available for use in many reloading applications, the IMR series of powder is trusted by reloaders all across the globe. 

 IMR Hi-Skor 700-X extruded flake powder is ideally suited for shotshells in 12 and 16 gauge where clay target and light field loads are the norm. It doubles as an excellent pistol target powder for such cartridges as the 38 Special and 45 ACP and many more.

postcontent:
Rifle is a Savage in 6.5 Creedmoor. Have basically stripped the factory rifle down to the action and built it up from there. Here is everything I have added on to it:

- Bell and Carlson A2 Stock (Black w/Grey webbing) ($260)
- Savage Stainless steel trigger guard ($20)
- McGowen 26" Stainless steel match Bull barrel (1:8 twist) ($300)
- Sharp Shooter Supply Competition recoil lug & barrel nut ($50)
- XL Tactical bolt handle ($30)
- Seekens Precision 20 MOA base and low rings ($200)
- Harris 6"-9" Bipod ($100)
- SWFA 12x Scope ($260)

The barrel, recoil lug, and barrel nut were installed by a professional gunsmith, along with having the barrel and tang free floated as well as the action and recoil lug bedded. Rifle has seen only about a box and a half of ammo (30 rounds) through it. After sighting it in at 200, I was making less than 3 inch groups at 500 yards. With the factory rifle itself costing $450, I have around $1650 (not including gunsmith costs) invested into this bolt action. With some new medical emergencies coming up recently, I must part with this rifle. Asking $1,300 as this is barely even used. Sorry for the crappy cell phone pic, I can send better ones on request.

title: For Sale:  270 bullets
location: 50 miles south of Topeka, Topeka, Kansas
postcontent:
These are mostly vintage and from an OLD collection-- some are slightly tarnished by age, but none have any corrosion or any issues that would effect performance.  These are dating back into the 70's and so here is the list:

34 130 grain Nosler BTSP (early 80s)
88 Herters 130 grain "semi-points" (early 70s and probably made by Sierra back then)
16 Winchester 130 grain HP (mid 70s)
71 Remington 130 grain mushroom corelokt HPs. (mid 80s)
105 Hornady "interlock" spire points (Mid 80s)
100 Sierra "Game King" 150 grain (boat tails from mid 2000s)

409 total and all are premium bullets in the two "darling" hunting (larger) weights for the .270 (130 gr and 150 gr).

Most are in the original boxes that have been taped (clear taped) to keep them from falling apart over the years.  They are clearly older, but there is very little oxidation on even the Herters (which look pretty good for their 40 or so years of age).  The Noslers and Sierra Game Kings are wrapped in clear plastic bags with ID tags in the bags.  

I live out of KC but come to town often and a meeting on a weekend would work.  Price and effort reflects a full lot purchase here at an agreed to date and time ON A WEEKEND somewhere in eastern Kansas OR a local pick-up in and around Emporia, KS.  I also have some .224 and some 7mm bullets I'd throw in for an additional, fair cost... but this lot needs to sell together please (cleaning out the closet here).  If someone wanted them shipped, a flat rate $10 box gets these to them.

For another $25 I'll also toss in a bag of 100 MORE Gamekings 150gr. bullets... which is costing way more than this lately-- no pics, sorry.

Send and email and be patient, I'll reply to all sincere emails.  Thank you.

100-yard Parallax Setting: Eliminates parallax for precise shooting.
Precise, 1/2" Hand-turn Tactical-Style Turrets: Positive click reticle adjustments get you zeroed in quicker and maintain your setting—even with repeated recoil.
Waterproof/Fogproof: Nitrogen filled and O-ring sealed.

Fully Multicoated Optical System: Provides up to 98% light transmission and maximum brightness from dawn to dusk.
Generous, Consistent Eye Relief: Keeps your brow safe—even with the heaviest recoiling cartridges, lightweight rifles, and severe shooting angles.
Zero-Reset Turret Feature: To simplify field adjustments, Nikon has integrated this feature into all new riflescopes. Just sight-in as usual, then lift the spring-loaded adjustment knob, rotate to your “zero”, and reengage. Field adjustments are now as simple as dialing-in your subsequent ranges.

title: For Sale:  30.06 Mauser Carl Schelkle custom
postcontent:
A beautiful rifle, customized with a handmade walnut stock, peep iron sights adjustable for windage and elevation. The original manufacture marks were covered with stippling, so a lot of the details are unknown. 

There is a crack in the stock, and a chip behind the receiver, the crack looks to have repaired, but I haven't attempted to remove the receiver to see if they used dowels from inside or just glued it. I shot a few rounds through it just to check function, and it shoots well and accurately. I did manage to find out a bit about the man who customized the rifle, enough to be interesting but I wish I could find more.

Price is obo, will consider partial trade for a nice pistol or mauser in 6.5 Swedish or 7.62x54.

title: For Sale:  Scammers!  Beware!
postcontent:
Be careful if you're trying to ship a weapon.  I've encountered two clowns that have already tried to get me to "pay before play" when they obviously don't know california gun laws ie. they're scammers.  Promises of high capacity magazines and good prices smells all too fishy.  These maggots claimed not to be ffl then turn around and claim they're ffl's.  
if you want to ship a weapon you think actually is a legitimate deal, use a local gun store to help broker the deal.  It's sickening these low life's made it here.  Please don't feed the animals, be cautious.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Romanian WASR 10/63 UF for AR-15
postcontent:
Hello armslist,

I picked this AK up not too long ago to turn into a lightweight recon/trunk gun and only got so far before realizing that I need another AR... One just isn't cutting it and want to go another direction. 

This WASR is your typical century build, it shoots straight and is sighted in but the parkerized finish isn't the best. But, it is built correctly and all the rivets are up to par and it functions like an AK should - even feeds soft point rounds which some AK's don't like. All the numbers match except for the bayonet. Front sight is barely canted but was easily sighted in, everything else is very reasonably straight for a WASR... Don't expect a KREBS or Waffen Werks. The mag well has no problems with any magazine that I have on hand from steel to magpul PMAGS even the chunky US palm mags. 

To shave some weight I added a saiga gas tube which doesn't have the extra sheet metal for the gas tube hand guard and I also have the original with a matching lower wood handguard I have both set ups pictured. 

Underfolders are hard to find right now, so I won't be giving this away - I will let it go for the best reasonable cash offer or, preferably I would like to trade this for a Nice upper level AR and I am willing to throw in a decent amount of cash ontop. 

So, please no low-ball offers, you will be ignored. I want an upper level AR, especially a piston version. I will throw in a few hundred bucks on top for your AR some of which I will list below. Cash wise, let's just say I would like to see more than $700 for the rifle.

title: For Sale:  Factory New in Box Walther PPS 9mm *ON SALE*
postcontent: We are a licensed dealer on located on the Southeast side of Indianapolis. We are now open in our new location. We invite you to stop by and pay us a visit in our new store. We are happy to ship this firearm anywhere in the Continental United State for a flat fee of $15 dollars. This item must be shipped to an FFL. All sales within Indiana are subject to Indiana sales tax. All credit/debit card sales will be assessed a 3.5% processing fee. We accept cash, Money Orders, Cashier's Checks, Visa, MasterCard, and Discover. Please contact us with any questions you may have. You can reach us by email by simply using the Contact button in this listing or you can call us at REDACTED Ext. 1. Can't find what you are looking for? Check out our website at www.wideopenarmsinc.com for additional selection. Thank you for looking. The Walther PPS, short for Police Pistol Slim, is a semi-automatic pistol developed by Walther of Germany for concealed carry for civilians and plainclothes law enforcement personnel. A self-defense handgun does no good if it is miles away when you need it. The PPS is a concealed carry firearm that is slim, light and comfortable to wear all day long. Yet it is fast to bring into action, pleasant to fire, and easy to shoot accurately. The Walther PPS is short recoil-operated locked breech and uses a modified Browning cam-lock system adapted from the venerable Hi-Power pistol. The PPS has a lightweight glass fiber-reinforced polymer frame with integrated steel slide rails. The frame also has an integrated Picatinny rail for attachment of tactical lights or lasers.The slide is steel with a resilient Tenifer nitride treatment, offering extreme resistance to wear, impact, and corrosion. Low profile three dot combat sights make rapid target acquisition easy and the rear sight is windage-adjustable. Two magazines are included, and this pistol ships in a Walther branded padded hard case. SPECS Caliber: 9mm Capacity: One 7 and one 8 round magazine included Barrel: 3.2" Dimensions: 6.3" long, 4.5" - 4.9" tall, .9" thick Weight: 1.3 pounds

title: For Sale:  NIB Beretta 92FS 9mm Italian Made 2 - 15 Round Factory Magazines JS92F300M
postcontent:
JS92F300M

BERETTA 

The 92 series of semiautomatic pistols operates on a short recoil, delayed blowback system, which yields; faster cycle times, exceptional accuracy and greater reliability. Double/Single action provides a very safe and timeproven design. High-capacity steel magazines are durable and drop-free when the magazine button is depressed, even when empty. Chrome-lined barrels provide extreme corrosion resistance, as well as ease of cleaning. Barrels also feature a deeply recessed combat muzzle crown to protect the rifling. 

. Open Slide Design: Open top slide virtually eliminates jamming and stove piping. Allows the user to load and chamber one cartridge at a time should the magazine be lost or damaged. 

. Disassembly Latch: Simplifies field stripping for maintenance by allowing quick and easy disassembly. Stays on the gun, preventing accidental dropping and loss. 

. Visible Automatic Firing Pin Block: The front part of the firing pin is blocked from any forward movement until the trigger is pulled completely back. The block is located rearward, far away from the fouling and debris of the breech face. Since the block is visible, the user may ascer tain its proper operation at any time. Even if the pistol falls and strikes the ground muzzle down, the firing pin will not strike the primer. 

. Rear Sight Profile: The rear sight is designed to provide a front projection so that in an emergency, the user may retract the slide single-handedly by pushing the rear sight against the edge of a table, door, etc. 

. External Hammer Design: A traditional feature of Beretta pistols, this design provides the energy to the firing pin, virtually eliminating the possibility of misfires due to light primer. Also provides an immediate visual and tactile indicator as to the cocked/uncocked status of the pistol. 

. No Glare Finish: Beretta’s exclusive BrunitonTM non-reflective black coating is a superior corrosion and wear resistant finish. 

. Light Aluminum Frame: Each pistol features a lightweight, forged frame made from extremely strong aircraft-quality aluminum alloy. 

. Reversible Magazine Release: Positioned next to the trigger guard for either right or left-handed shooters, allowing rapid reloading. Magazine drops clear when released. 

. Unique Ultra Safe Design: The ambidextrous safety lever, easily accessible by the thumb of a right or left handed shooter, is spring loaded so it’s either positively “on” or “off ”. The safety lever also functions as the pistol’s decocking lever. When pushed down, the rear part of the firing pin (striker) is rotated out of alignment with the front part of the firing pin. Additional hammer drop catch (half-cock notch prevents striking of the firing pin unit) in the remote chance of unintentional hammer drop. 

. High-Capacity Magazines: The 92 family magazines are interchangeable within caliber, and range in capacity from 10 to 20 rounds in 9mm. 


SPECIFICATIONS: 


SKU# - JS92F300M

OVERALL LENGTH - 8.5" 

OVERALL HEIGHT - 5.4" 

OVERALL WIDTH - 1.3" 

BARREL LENGTH - 4.9" 

SIGHT RADIUS - 6.1" 

GRIP WIDTH - 1.3" 

WEIGHT UNLOADED - 33.3oz 

SIGHTS - 3-DOT IRON SIGHTS 

MAGAZINE CAPACITY - 15 ROUNDS 

MSRP $675.00



Visit our website at www.BIGDEEZGUNS.com , look for this firearm and add it to cart to see your tremendous savings on this particular firearm !


Shipping Information :

We ship through the United States Postal Service ( 2-day priority shipping on all handguns ) .

title: For Sale:  NIB Beretta 92FS 9mm Italian Made 2 - 15 Round Factory Magazines JS92F300M
postcontent:
JS92F300M

BERETTA 

The 92 series of semiautomatic pistols operates on a short recoil, delayed blowback system, which yields; faster cycle times, exceptional accuracy and greater reliability. Double/Single action provides a very safe and timeproven design. High-capacity steel magazines are durable and drop-free when the magazine button is depressed, even when empty. Chrome-lined barrels provide extreme corrosion resistance, as well as ease of cleaning. Barrels also feature a deeply recessed combat muzzle crown to protect the rifling. 

. Open Slide Design: Open top slide virtually eliminates jamming and stove piping. Allows the user to load and chamber one cartridge at a time should the magazine be lost or damaged. 

. Disassembly Latch: Simplifies field stripping for maintenance by allowing quick and easy disassembly. Stays on the gun, preventing accidental dropping and loss. 

. Visible Automatic Firing Pin Block: The front part of the firing pin is blocked from any forward movement until the trigger is pulled completely back. The block is located rearward, far away from the fouling and debris of the breech face. Since the block is visible, the user may ascer tain its proper operation at any time. Even if the pistol falls and strikes the ground muzzle down, the firing pin will not strike the primer. 

. Rear Sight Profile: The rear sight is designed to provide a front projection so that in an emergency, the user may retract the slide single-handedly by pushing the rear sight against the edge of a table, door, etc. 

. External Hammer Design: A traditional feature of Beretta pistols, this design provides the energy to the firing pin, virtually eliminating the possibility of misfires due to light primer. Also provides an immediate visual and tactile indicator as to the cocked/uncocked status of the pistol. 

. No Glare Finish: Beretta’s exclusive BrunitonTM non-reflective black coating is a superior corrosion and wear resistant finish. 

. Light Aluminum Frame: Each pistol features a lightweight, forged frame made from extremely strong aircraft-quality aluminum alloy. 

. Reversible Magazine Release: Positioned next to the trigger guard for either right or left-handed shooters, allowing rapid reloading. Magazine drops clear when released. 

. Unique Ultra Safe Design: The ambidextrous safety lever, easily accessible by the thumb of a right or left handed shooter, is spring loaded so it’s either positively “on” or “off ”. The safety lever also functions as the pistol’s decocking lever. When pushed down, the rear part of the firing pin (striker) is rotated out of alignment with the front part of the firing pin. Additional hammer drop catch (half-cock notch prevents striking of the firing pin unit) in the remote chance of unintentional hammer drop. 

. High-Capacity Magazines: The 92 family magazines are interchangeable within caliber, and range in capacity from 10 to 20 rounds in 9mm. 


SPECIFICATIONS: 


SKU# - JS92F300M

OVERALL LENGTH - 8.5" 

OVERALL HEIGHT - 5.4" 

OVERALL WIDTH - 1.3" 

BARREL LENGTH - 4.9" 

SIGHT RADIUS - 6.1" 

GRIP WIDTH - 1.3" 

WEIGHT UNLOADED - 33.3oz 

SIGHTS - 3-DOT IRON SIGHTS 

MAGAZINE CAPACITY - 15 ROUNDS 

MSRP $675.00

title: For Sale/Trade:  Remington 870 Wingmaster 18" smooth cyl. bore YOUR WAY!! Lower Price, More Trades considered!
postcontent: Whether you like it classical or tactical this is a security shotgun everyone can love. There is no better made, no more rugged and reliable, no more trusted security shotgun then the Remington 870 Wingmaster. This is a gem of a shotgun was formerly part of an armored transport arsenal so it has seen a lot of cycling without a lot of wear on the barrel. The armorer installed rifle sights on the 18” smooth cylinder bore barrel which makes it the shortest barrel I have seen that will put a slug right where you want it (and maybe the only shotgun of its kind for sale anywhere in the country). This shotgun shows handling but is in fantastic mechanical condition. Most of the furniture shown also shows use except for the black synthetic Remington set which is like new. I am looking for $450 for a basic setup +$ depending on whether you want the Mesa Tactical 8rd side saddle and/or Surefire M951 weapon light with infrared filter and remote switch on vertical grip (will provide extra set of CR123 batteries in the grip). Sorry for the forward grip and Surefire remote switch not being shown with the Knoxx Spec Ops setup, it is currently off playing with friends, you will have to use your imagination. If you don’t want to be limited to a single set of furniture I highly encourage buying her a 2’nd or 3’rd pair of cloths (we can work out a deal for additional stocks and fore ends). The wood stock for instance has a high cheek rise specifically for these sights which makes for natural and intuitive aiming though it would need the fore end trimmed if you want to use a side saddle. If you wanted to invest in a Cerakote job this could be your ultimate shotgun, or if you like a workhorse that shows its grit then it’s perfect for you now.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Kalashnikov signed AK-47
location: The Columbia Gorge, Oregon, United States
postcontent:
I have a newer AKM70B1 chambered in 7.62x39 classic ak style
stock. it features 1:10 twist, chrome lined barrel, new chrome fast
fire piston, polished chrome bolt, tapco trigger, oak wood stock (not
that shitty plywood), end plate (which makes it safe to shoot without
any buttstock), new Classic flash hider on the threaded barrel,
original AK sights with flip up front and rear built on, gas shut off
(in case you want to shoot one bullet at a time to accurize), and
grenade launcher sights. I paid 1200 for the rifle (with reciept), and another 60 for the new chrome fast fire
piston, and 18 for the new flash hider
AT THIS POINT your probably wondering why I paid 1200 for this ak.
BECAUSE this AK has a certificate of authentication for being signed by General Makhail Timofeyevich Kalashnikov himself in june of 2013 before his death in december 2013
also have more pics
The signature alone on a piece of paper sold on ebay for $772.67
also have authentication for signature.

title: For Sale:  Fnh Scar 17s
postcontent: A gently used Scar 17 s chambered in .308 Winchester. It comes with a magnesium (not aluminum) Handl Defense lower so it can accept any SR-25 mags (much more common and cheaper. Magpul has a 25rd mag for it). You can easily switch back to the original FN lower if you'd rather use the OEM mags. I prefer the metal one though. It also comes with a Timney trigger installed on the Handl lower(which is the best you can buy). You also get the real (non-knock-off) Grip Pod seen in pics. It comes with the extended and much better charging handle. You also get the Hi-Desert Dog modified Hogue grip with battery storage built in. It comes with a Vltor flashlight mount AND the 500 lumen Surefire Hellfire light (when holding the grip pod your thumb is right there ready to hit the light). Don't forget, you also get the AAC flash hider (of course the original SCAR muzzle is included too). You get 5 FN factory 20rd mags and 1 10rd Magpul SR-25 mag. I'm also including all of the rail covers to protect your new gun.

title: For Sale:  Colt Officers Commencement Issue 45ACP
postcontent: Colt Officers Commencement Issue 45ACP NIB New in Box.Colt only manufactured 1000 of these total, (this one is number 892), in 1984. Now Colt has made other limited run pieces like this before. Colt never sold this model to the public, ever. These pistols were presented to very select graduating officers during very prestigious US Marine Commencement Ceremonies. This pistol comes in the original Colt solid wood velvet lined presentation case. This is a Colt Officer's Commencement Issue Series 80 45 ACP. Has a 3 1/2" barrel, 6 shot magazine, blue finish, 3-dot sights, dovetail rear and fixed front, has officers commencement issue and acorns, leaves on left side, silver engraved. Right side in silver engrave ACP series 80 2 eagles acorns and leaves.

title: For Sale:  1969 Ruger No.1 7mm Rem Mag Rare & Early Number 1
postcontent: 3rd Year Production 1969 Ruger No.1 7mm Rem. Mag Rare & Early. Ruger rings included. Minor flaws described as follows: 1) Pic# 10 shows close-up of very small flaws in the blue of the barrel, which you can barely see in Pic# 5. 2) Pic# 11 shows close-up of bruise in L/H side of forearm. It can also be seen in Pic#3. 3) Pic# 12 shows very small dings in the comb of the stock. 4) Use my finger as a reference to the size of flaws in pics. This is a 3rd year production, no-prefix 4 digit S/N, pre-warning gun from my collection.

title: For Sale/Trade:  FN FNP-9 with a pile of mags and CCW holster, Covina, Will Ship
postcontent: The FNP-9 is a great service pistol featuring an accessory rail and controls very similar to the Sig P226 and related models. I very recently picked it up looking to find something more compact than my CZ SP-01 for both home defense and potentially CCW. After taking it to the range I have determined that it is not as good a fit as my CZ was and I don't want to rely on something that I will be less proficient with for home defense for the sake of possibly getting a CCW license in the future. I have only put about 200 rounds through it, a variety of FMJ and JHP without any issues. It is in excellent condition comes with 3 10rd mags and 3 16 round sets of repair parts for law enforcement or out of state shipment (where legal). Also comes with a very nice Triple K #420 "Secret Agent" holster in "walnut oil" (red/brown).

title: For Sale:  NIB Sig Sauer 1911 .40s&w STAINLESS Traditional Match Elite 1911T-40-SME
postcontent:
1911T-40-SME


The traditional models feature the recognizable “round-top” 1911 slide profile, front cocking serrations and a lightweight, three-hole trigger. Standard on all models are a match-grade barrel, flat mainspring housing and speed bump grip safety. Front straps have 25LPI checking and the mainspring housing has 20LPI for optimum grip and user comfort. 

The 1911 Traditional Match Elite is the first SIG SAUER® 1911 to be offered in a caliber other than .45 Auto. A full-size 1911, the Match Elite chambered in .45ACP is available as a two-tone with a natural stainless steel frame and a Nitron-coated slide. The 9mm and .40S&W Match Elite models are also full sized, but feature a natural stainless slide and frame, white controls and adjustable target sights. The Match Elites feature Hogue custom wood checkered grips.

postcontent:

I'm selling the whole package (rifle, sling, scope, and maybe some loose rounds if I can find any) for $460. I'll also trade it for a new Ruger American All-Weather Compact .308 or a CZ-P07 9mm or .40 plus cash on your end.

I can email more pictures if needed. It comes with the scope rings, and the already-smooth bolt was coated with Tru-Glide, making it a little smoother.

postcontent: I have up for sale my Beautiful 1915 Westinghouse Mosin nagant. In great shape for her age.All numbers appear to match up with the exception of the mag floor plate. title: For Sale:  Fnh Scar 17s
postcontent: A gently used Scar 17 s chambered in .308 Winchester. It comes with a magnesium (not aluminum) Handl Defense lower so it can accept any SR-25 mags (much more common and cheaper. Magpul has a 25rd mag for it). You can easily switch back to the original FN lower if you'd rather use the OEM mags. I prefer the metal one though. It also comes with a Timney trigger installed on the Handl lower(which is the best you can buy). You also get the real (non-knock-off) Grip Pod seen in pics. It comes with the extended and much better charging handle. You also get the Hi-Desert Dog modified Hogue grip with battery storage built in. It comes with a Vltor flashlight mount AND the 500 lumen Surefire Hellfire light (when holding the grip pod your thumb is right there ready to hit the light). Don't forget, you also get the AAC flash hider (of course the original SCAR muzzle is included too). You get 5 FN factory 20rd mags and 1 10rd Magpul SR-25 mag. I'm also including all of the rail covers to protect your new gun.

title: For Sale:  870 express magnum
postcontent: I have an remington 870 express magnum. Nothing is wrong with it as I used it for turkey season and just couldn't get into it. It comes with a turkey slate call, turkey choke and the mod choke that came with it, a box of remington express shells (a couple missing), and 2-3 boxes of federal birdshot. The gun holds 4 +1 and I've never had any problems with it as I've taken care of the gun as it should've been. I'm selling for 300$ but am willing to negotiate, If you're interested my number is -REDACTED-
